original_text: His eyes are like blazing fire, and on his head are many crowns. He has a name written on him that no one knows but he himself.
korean_text: 그 눈은 불꽃 같고 그 머리에는 많은 관들이 있고 또 이름 쓴 것 하나가 있으니 자기밖에 아는 자가 없고

sentences.original_text: His eyes are like blazing fire
and on his head are many crowns
He has a name written on him
that no one knows but he himself
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 자신 외에는 아는 자가 없느니라
